page.title: 02Environment - care of
page.content:
Our area used to be completely{rural. Then the{factories}came and belched out smoke.They tipped rubbish every- where.Some{factories}also cut down trees to clear the area for building. The{canal}became polluted as well.Our area had been spoiled by industry. { }Now our area is being restord to its former beauty.This is being done by the{Youth Training Scheme.}They are landscaping shabby areas and clearing the{Canal}from rubbish.Our area is greatly improving.I would like to see in our area changes that would make it even more beautiful-plant more trees and clear all the tips from rubbish.I hope that people will appre- ciate all the improvements and keep our area neat and tidy.
{ }
